caption.p: Hypothetical model showing the effect of RA on EV-A71â€™s entry in host cells. (A) RA binds to EV-A71, preventing the virus from binding to the receptor and inhibiting its entry into the host cell. (B) We proposed that the amount of RA binding to the recombinant mutant virus will be less due to the specific N104K mutation, and the virus entry will not inhibited.
